qualifications_other_reason_details: your degree is not aligned to your choice of subject and you were unable to elaborate confidently on aspects of the English curriculum in interview; this can be worked on.
performance_at_interview_what_to_improve:
We are unable to offer you a place for our September cohort to train to teach English, but I urge you not to give up on this yet; you have a lot of potential and we felt in interview that the main barrier was a lack of sufficient Subject Knowledge ...you were unable to elaborate confidently on aspects of the English curriculum in interview; this can be worked on.
As I suggested, please consider trying to gain further experience and opportunities at your current placement over the next weeks, and look to reapply when our next cohort opens in October,
